20 Restaurant Deals for Seniors By Althea Chang Pin It 1 of 22
Saving Money Dining Out Early bird specials may be harder to come by these days, but retirees on a budget can still enjoy the occasional restaurant outing without breaking the bank thanks to senior discounts at many nationwide chains.
Chain restaurants may not advertise their discounts, but they may be willing to do give you a deal if you ask for one. Here are some popular restaurants offering deals for retirees as young as just 50 years old.
Be sure to bring identification with your birth date on it, however. Regardless of how old (or young) you look, some restaurants may want you to prove your age before giving you the deal.
Photo Credit: Getty Images Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
1 of 22
2 of 22
Golden Corral Golden Corral calls itself American's #1 buffet and grill and boasts “grilled to order sirloin steaks, pork, seafood, shrimp, and chicken,” pot roast that’s been simmered for 12 hours, home made meatloaf, fried chicken, mac and cheese and plenty of fresh salad options as well as cakes, pies, ice cream and cookies for dessert.
In the morning, the Golden Corral breakfast buffet offers made-to-order omelettes, pancakes, French toast, sausage, bacon, fruit and pastries among other options.
Deals for Seniors: You should definitely call before you go, but we hear that most Golden Corrals offer about 10% off for seniors aged 60 and up. And if you arrive at the end of breakfast and you’re lucky, you may even be able to stay and enjoy lunch as well. Discounts may vary by location.
Photo Credit: Kenneth Hynek Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
2 of 22
3 of 22
IHOP Senior pancake lovers as well as those with a taste for the savory can get a discount at nationwide pancake chain, IHOP, which also serves burgers and sandwiches.
Deals for Seniors: IHOP offers a 10% discount for those over age 55. Deals may vary by location.
Photo Credit: kkennedy Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
3 of 22
4 of 22
Waffle House Waffle House has served 495,264,367 waffles, 123,587,123 t-bone steaks and 22,217,455 slices of pie since 1955, according to the company’s Web site, and it’s amassed a substantial group of regulars . It might not be the healthiest food in the world, but it serves up tasty versions of breakfast basics with a bottomless cup of coffee.
Deals for Seniors: Depending on where you live, your local Waffle House may have a senior menu which offers smaller portions at lower prices .
Photo Credit: LenTheGeek Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
4 of 22
5 of 22
Elephant Bar Restaurant Elephant Bar Restaurants aim to provide a relaxing, tropical-themed environment for casual dining on food and drinks from the classics to the more exotic, the chain says .
Deals for Seniors: If you’re 60 years of age or older, and you sign up for the Senior Explorer VIP Card , you can get 20% off lunch and dinner, not including drinks.
Photo Credit: elephantbar.com Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
5 of 22
6 of 22
Denny's This nationwide, classic and affordable family dining establishment has special senior discounts and meals just for seniors .
Deals for Seniors: The Denny’s Senior Slam with French toast comes with one piece of toast, one egg, and two strips of bacon or two sausages for $5.49, as opposed to the regular French toast slam which comes with two pieces of toast, two eggs, two strips of bacon and two sausages for $6.99, notes The New York Times . That's half the food, but it's only a buck and a half cheaper, but perhaps those who'd rather not waste food would consider the meal worth it.
Photo Credit: House of Sims Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
6 of 22
7 of 22
Sizzler Discounts on already-affordable meals may be available at your local Sizzler restaurant, and there’s a special menu for seniors too.
Deals for Seniors: At Sizzler, the senior menu features lists dinner entrees like fresh fish to chicken to beef for $5.99 and a buffet for $6.49. Certain locations may not include the same menu options, notes the Los Angeles Times .
Photo Credit: sizzler.com Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
7 of 22
8 of 22
Friendly's Restaurant and Ice Cream Friendly’s ice cream can be found in grocery stores across the country, but there are also restaurant locations where sandwiches, burgers and greasy snacks are also available.
Deals for Seniors: Seniors can aged 60 and over can get special breakfasts like two eggs cooked to order, pancakes or French toast with sausage or bacon, plus coffee, toast and jelly, at senior-friendly pricing that varies based on location.
Photo Credit: busbeytheelder Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
8 of 22
9 of 22
Buffets Buffets Inc., the parent company of Old Country, Hometown and Country Buffet offers classic, affordable buffets of grilled meats, cooked vegetables, salads and desserts. And the company says its one of the largest restaurant chains in America, serving about 75 million customers a year.
Deals for Seniors: Diners 60 years and up can buy a Senior Club card for $1 and get discounts for a full year.
Photo Credit: quinnanya Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
9 of 22
10 of 22
Fuddruckers This national burger joint is in the business of “Making the world a burger place,” according to one tagline on the company’s Web site . Deals for Seniors: Fuddruckers patrons say the restaurants may give seniors a 10% discount or a discount on certain plates if you’re 55 or older. Participation may vary.
Photo Credit: EmerandSam Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
10 of 22
11 of 22
Ponderosa Steakhouse Besides its buffet and steak, Ponderosa specializes in burgers, sandwiches and chicken, and it’s ready to accommodate large groups, according to the company’s Web site.
Deals for Seniors: Special menu and cheaper senior pricing, but menus and deals may vary by location. There are also lunch specials between 11 a.m. and 4 p.m.
Photo Credit: ponderosasteakhouses.com Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
11 of 22
12 of 22
Shoney's This 62-year-old restaurant chain started out as a little drive-in in Charleston, W. Va. Now there are hundreds of locations in 18 states serving their all-American favorites, the company says .
Deals: Senior discounts vary by location, so the company says to ask your server what’s available at the location near you.
Photo Credit: Jeff Keen Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
12 of 22
13 of 22
Carrows Carrows appears to have a few more healthy options than many of the national restaurant chains with notable deals for seniors. The chain also has banquet rooms at some of its locations where big groups can meet up for a meal.
Deals for Seniors: There’s a special senior menu with smaller portions for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Prices vary by location.
Photo Credit: carrows.com Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
13 of 22
14 of 22
Chili's Grill&Bar Chili’s ribs are smoked in-house, and the company boasts some healthier choices as well as a vegetarian menu. What's more, Chili’s isn’t just concerned with filling your plate. The restaurant is in the midst of a 10-year plan to donate $50 million to St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital.
Deals for Seniors: A 10% discount for seniors aged 55 and older at participating locations.
Photo Credit: TheTruthAbout... Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
14 of 22
15 of 22
Country Kitchen Country Kitchen promises “real food and fast food prices,” including full meals like a barbecue chicken dinner or a cheeseburger and fries for $5 at participating locations.
Deals for Seniors: Country Kitchen has special offers for 55-plus crowd as well as membership discounts .
Photo Credit: countrykitchenrestaurants.com Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
15 of 22
16 of 22
Burgers Basic fast food chains offer senior discounts, so if you haven’t been taking advantage of them, now’s the time to start. Arby's, McDonald's (Stock Quote: MCD ), Burger King (Stock Quote: BKC ), Carl's Jr., Hardees (Stock Quote: CKR ), Dairy Queen, Jack in the Box (Stock Quote: JACK ), Wendy’s (Stock Quote: WEN ), Whataburger and Sonic Drive-In have discounts for seniors, according to some restaurant goers who stop at one of these restaurants for a quick meal.
Deals for Seniors: Deals may include a percentage off your meal or a free drink.
Photo Credit: jetalone Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
16 of 22
17 of 22
Chicken Older lovers of fried chicken may be able to get senior discount at a number of chicken chains including Chick-fil-A, Church's Chicken, KFC (Stock Quote: YUM ), Popeye's Fried Chicken and Boston Market, some consumers note .
Deals for Seniors: Restaurants may offer a certain percentage off of your purchase or a free drink with your meal.
Photo Credit: boo_licious Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
17 of 22
18 of 22
Taco Bell Taco Bell is one of the oldest and biggest Mexican-style restaurant chains in the United States, the company says . And like Chili’s, the chain and its parent company, Yum! Brands, contributes a portion of its earnings to charity with its Taco Bell Foundation for Teens.
Deals for Seniors: One consumer reports that Taco Bell gives seniors free drinks at participating locations.
Photo Credit: pixculture Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
18 of 22
19 of 22
Long John Silver's For fast fried fish as well as chicken, shrimp, fries, coleslaw and hushpuppies, and even new and lighter options , Long John Silvers might be an affordable choice.
Deals for Seniors: Discount for seniors aged 55 and older at participating locations .
Photo Credit: ljsilvers.com Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
19 of 22
20 of 22
Restaurant.com Restaurant.com already offers gift certificates at a significant discount to their face value, but discounts for seniors are available through the AARP.
Deals for Seniors: Currently, AARP members can get a $25 gift certificate for $2 through the AARP .
Photo Credit: aarp.org Related Articles
10 Great Restaurant Review Sites 9 High-End Fast Food Meals Cheap, Gross Delicacies
20 of 22
21 of 22
Desserts Sometimes just a taste of something sweet would hit the spot, so even if you want dessert or a sweet snack, there are several senior discounts you can take advantage of. Krispy Kreme (Stock Quote: KKD ), Dunkin Donuts, Dairy Queen, TCBY and Mrs. Fields offer discounts for seniors, according to some of those chains’ patrons .
Mrs. Fields, for example, may give those over 60 a 10% discount on purchases, and TCBY might offer a 10% discount for those over 55, depending on your location.
Photo Credit: Jennie Faber Related Articles
